Description: Up for auction is an absolutely killer 1979-1980 vintage Gibson Les Paul Custom in Original White finish nicely aged to coveted Cream color - talking about Randy Rhoads vibe! Comes in the Original Harshell Case. 100% original parts featuring 1979-1980 dated pots, 'PAT NO' t-top humbuckers for that killer vintage tone, original bridge, knobs, tuners, etc. No modern model can come close to the amazingly warm, fat and singing tone of these vintage Les Paul's! So, Don't miss out! This guitar is in FANTASTIC cosmetic condition ~~ SUPER CLEAN showing only very light play wear! Very minor aging on the Gold hardware. Neck is PERFECT and has a neck profile which feels like a cross between the 60s and 50s neck more on the slim side. The original frets show only minor wear. SWEET action and AMAZING playability!
